section.name: Overview
section.p: The TCP connector enables OpenJMS clients to connect to the OpenJMS server using TCP/IP sockets.

It is configured by adding a <Connector> element to <Connectors> section of the $OPENJMS_HOME/config/openjms.xml file, with a scheme of type "tcp". E.g:
<Connectors> <Connector scheme="tcp"> <ConnectionFactories> <ConnectionFactory name="TCPConnectionFactory"/> </ConnectionFactories> </Connector> </Connectors>
